mapper.select: select * from product order by productId DESC
mapper.insert: insert into product (productId, productName, category, detailCategory, image, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, content, price, delivery, supplierId) values( #{productId}, #{productName}, #{category}, #{detailCategory}, #{image}, #{attribute1}, #{attribute2}, #{attribute3}, #{content}, #{price}, #{delivery}, #{supplierId} )
